name: UserProvisioningPlugin

methods.name: buildDescribeCall
methods.description: Use this method to add more input and output parameters to those defined in the base class.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Returns a Process.PluginDescribeResult object that describes this method call.

methods.name: getPluginClassName
methods.description: Returns the name of the class implementing the plugin.

methods.name: invoke
methods.description: Primary method that the system invokes when the class that implements the interface is instantiated.

description: The UserProvisioningPlugin base class implements Process.Plugin for programmatic customization of the user provisioning process for connected apps.
